title: Northstar Service Mesh
problem: Studio ventures building regulated APIs burn weeks on authz, observability, and zero-trust plumbing before shipping features.
market: 12 in-flight ventures + partner firms that need HIPAA/SOC2-ready service mesh with prescriptive defaults.
team: Platform TL, infra engineer, SRE, and security architect shared across ventures.
tech: Rust control plane, Envoy data plane, OPA policies, Terraform modules, and GCS-backed manifest store.
description: Opinionated mesh with baked-in policies, playbook-driven scaffolds, and UI for policy diffing per venture.

score.notes: Requires heroic effort on DX; SRE backlog funded.
